    <h2 class="title-2">
        <a id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox1_C016_ctl00_ctl00_hlTitle" onclick="trackOutboundLink(this, &#39;Refer now&#39;, &#39;/professionals/make-a-referral&#39;); return false;" href="/professionals/make-a-referral" target="_blank">GPs - make a referral now</a>
        
    </h2>       
    <p id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox1_C016_ctl00_ctl00_pFeatureBoxImage" class="feature-box-image">
        <a id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox1_C016_ctl00_ctl00_hlImage" onclick="trackOutboundLink(this, &#39;Refer now&#39;, &#39;/professionals/make-a-referral&#39;); return false;" href="/professionals/make-a-referral" target="_blank"><img id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox1_C016_ctl00_ctl00_imgFeature" src="http://www.priorygroup.com/images/default-source/professionals/gp-referral-homepage-banner-small.jpg?sfvrsn=0" /></a>

        <span id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox1_C016_ctl00_ctl00_lbContent">Our GP referral process is simple, safe and secure. </div></span>

            <div class="grid_4">
                
<span id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009">

<div class="feature-box">
          
    <h2 class="title-2">
        <a id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009_ctl00_ctl00_hlTitle" href="/about-the-priory-group/our-services">How can we help you? </a>
        
    </h2>       
    <p id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009_ctl00_ctl00_pFeatureBoxImage" class="feature-box-image">
        <a id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009_ctl00_ctl00_hlImage" href="/about-the-priory-group/our-services"><img id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009_ctl00_ctl00_imgFeature" src="http://www.priorygroup.com/images/default-source/conditions--education/addictionscounsellinghome.jpg?sfvrsn=2" /></a>
    </p>
    <p class="feature-box-content">
        <span id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009_ctl00_ctl00_lbContent">We provide a range of mental health and addictions treatments at our hospitals and rehab centres. This includes <strong><a href="/addictions">alcohol & drug addictions</a>, <a href="/mental-health/stress-treatment-counselling">stress</a>, <a href="/mental-health/depression">depression</a>, <a href="/mental-health/anxiety">anxiety</a>,
<a href="/eating-disorders">eating disorders</a></strong> and <strong><a href="/mental-health/obsessive-compulsive-disorder-ocd">obsessive compulsive disorders</a>.</strong></span>
    </p>
    <a id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C009_ctl00_ctl00_hlFeature" class="read-more" href="/about-the-priory-group/our-services">View Our Services </a>
</div></span><span id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C014">

<div class="feature-box">
          
    <h2 class="title-2">
        <a id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C014_ctl00_ctl00_hlTitle" onclick="trackOutboundLink(this, &#39;Seek help now&#39;, &#39;http://www.priorygroup.com/mental-health/depression&#39;); return false;" href="http://www.priorygroup.com/mental-health/depression">Depression treatment</a>
        
    </h2>       
    <p id="cphMainContent_FeatureBox2_C014_ctl00_ctl00_pFeatureBoxImage" class="feature-box-image">
